MeasureImprovementNotation

Improvement notation for a measure (e.g. increase or decrease).

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/measure-improvement-notation defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
increase IncreaseImprovement in the measure is noted as an increase in the measure score.
decrease DecreaseImprovement in the measure is noted as a decrease in the measure score.

name: MeasureImprovementNotation
title: MeasureImprovementNotation
description: Improvement notation for a measure (e.g. increase or decrease).

concept.definition: Improvement in the measure is noted as an increase in the measure score.
